title: high ping and having lag.
body: I finally got league to download on my computer but now in the loading screen it says I have 37 ping, but when I enter the game it starts at 80 ping then will go up to 200 to 600 and sometimes to 100 and then sometimes i get over 9000 ping. It even went up to 12k ping. Anyone know why this is happening?

replies.body:
It sounds like there may be unstable nodes along your network route to the server. Before we take an in-depth look at your route, we first need to ensure that your local settings are compatible with our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Should your issues persist through those configuration changes, let me know.
